pd_0_com_0text: Act three! The finale! The culmination of all your hopes and dreams!
pd_0_com_1text: Well and everyone else’s too, of course. Now I do believe you have a dress rehearsal to get to, hm?
pd_1_com_0text:
PLACEHOLDER

In the black screen, a white “Act 3” fades into view. The NARRATOR speaks.
pd_2_com_0text:
PLACEHOLDER

The “Act 3” words fade to black, then we fade up to the STAGE set again. THOMAS and DANIEL are on stage, dressed as Scrooge and the Ghost of Christmas Future respectively. Once more, they appear “frozen” as their GIFS don’t move.
pd_3_com_0text: Oh excellent! This is my favorite part, you know. The crippling existentialism of it all is rather delicious, don’t you agree?
pd_3_com_1text: No? Well your loss then. Don’t let me keep you longer than I must. Remember, one more chance to make tonight’s opening day count!
